TITLE: Plagiarism Detection
DEF: Platforms that aim to identify instances of academic dishonesty
TASK: The Plagiarism Detection Tools pattern is designed to identify instances of academic dishonesty and support the integrity of the educational process. The pattern promotes ethical behavior, respect for intellectual property, and originality in students' work, fostering a culture of integrity and original thinking. Ensuring the accurate detection of plagiarism, educating learners about academic honesty, and providing feedback for improvement are ways to uphold the pattern's purpose.
